# Templates

Use these templates to keep docs consistent and easy to review.

## Available Templates

- [PRD](./prd-template.md)
- [RFC](./rfc-template.md)
- [ADR](./adr-template.md)
- [Meeting Notes](./meeting-notes-template.md)
- [Weekly Update](./weekly-update-template.md)
- [Postmortem](./postmortem-template.md)
- [Runbook](./runbook-template.md)
- [Onboarding Checklist](./onboarding-checklist-template.md)
- [OKR](./okr-template.md)
- [Decision Log Entry](./decision-log-entry-template.md)
- [Customer Insight](./customer-insight-template.md)
- [Role Scorecard](./role-scorecard-template.md)
